brainly_data.question:
NEED HELP ASAP The angels, not half so happy in Heaven, Went envying her and me– Yes!–that was the reason (as all men know, In this kingdom by the sea) That the wind came out of the cloud by night, Chilling and killing my Annabel Lee. 
Which statement best describes the effect of sound devices on the stanza? A. They reinforce the thought that if heaven were a happier place, Annabel Lee would not have had to die. B. They draw attention to the angels’ unhappiness and envy as the cause of Annabel Lee’s death. C. They imply that all of Annabel Lee’s relatives knew about the speaker’s troubled love. D. They mirror the sound of the ocean, calling attention to the word sea.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:

They draw attention to the angels’ unhappiness and envy as the cause of Annabel Lee’s death. C. They imply that all of Annabel Lee’s relatives knew about the speaker’s troubled love. D. all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: I think D is your answer. Good luck

all_answers.text: Stanza is when poetry is written in chucks of lines, so you really cannot tell the answer if we cannot see the way the poem is written
